S

saveGame() - Method in class Game.Connect4Game
Method to convert the currently used GameBoard object into a SimpleGameBoard object and to save it to a file using a JFileChooser.
saveToHistory() - Method in class Game.Connect4Game
Method which is called when a game ends, which converts the current GameBoard to a SimpleGameBoard and stores it in an ArrayList of SimpleGameBoard within the game_history.c4g file for viewing in the history window.
setAIStuff(boolean, int) - Method in class Game.GameBoard
Method to set the AI toggle and AI difficulty of a GameBoard object.
setAIStuff(boolean, int) - Method in class Game.SimpleGameBoard
Method to set AI related parameters of a SimpleGameBoard object.

Method to set the board size of a SimpleGameBoard object.

Method to set the game state of a SimpleGameBoard object.

Method to set the last AI move made in a SimpleGameBoard object.

SimpleGameBoard - Class in Game
An instantiable, simplified version of the GameBoard class which is used for save/load states, since IOStream seems to have an issue with the regular GameBoard, presumably due to the 2D array of GameTile, which extends JLabel.
SimpleGameBoard() - Constructor for class Game.SimpleGameBoard
Default no-argument constructor for a SimpleGameBoard object.
SimpleGameBoard(int, int[][]) - Constructor for class Game.SimpleGameBoard
2 argument constructor for a SimpleGameBoard object.
startTimer() - Method in class Game.GameTimer
Method which sets timerRunning to true, creates a new thread called timer, and starts the thread.
stopTimer() - Method in class Game.GameTimer
Method which sets timerRunning to false, and interrupts the running thread.
switchPlayer() - Method in class Game.GameBoard
Method to switch the current player of a GameBoard object.
